title: Natural Creamy Peanut Butter | Jif
description: Make the perfect PB&J with Jif's Natural Creamy Peanut Butter made with five simple ingredients. Shop now for yours today!
cleaned_text: Natural Peanut Butter Natural Creamy Peanut Butter Spread Contains 90% Peanuts Our Natural Creamy Peanut Butter Spread is made with five simple ingredients for a naturally delicious taste you'll love. No stirring required! Available Sizes: 16 oz Plastic Jar, 28 oz Plastic Jar, 40 oz Plastic Jar, 80 oz Plastic Multipack Available Forms: much in natural creamy peanut butter?](#accordion-0) - Our Jif® Natural Creamy Peanut Butter has a protein content of 7g per serving, &% of daily value (2 Tbps (33g)), with 16g fat and 3.5g saturated fat per serving. [Does natural creamy peanut butter need to be refrigerated?](#accordion-1) - Nope! Our Jif® Natural Creamy Peanut Butter does not need refrigerated after opening. [How to store natural creamy peanut butter?](#accordion-2) - We suggest storing Jif® Natural Creamy Peanut Butter at room temperature, in the cupboard or pantry. [Does natural peanut butter need to be mixed ?](#accordion-3) - While Jif® Natural Creamy Peanut Butter should not require mixing, a small amount of oil separation is normal, and we suggest gently stirring this back into the product to enjoy! [How many calories are in a teaspoon of natural creamy peanut butter?](#accordion-4) - Unfortunately, this is not something we have calculated at this time. Our Jif® Natural Creamy Peanut Butter contains 190 calories per serving (2 Tbsp (33g)). [When does a jar of natural creamy peanut butter expire?](#accordion-5) - .Jif® Natural Creamy Peanut Butter has a shelf life of 12 months when unopened. We suggest using prior to the Best When Used By date printed on the jar for the best quality and flavor. Once opened, we suggest using within 3 months.
